content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) that smelts iron ore into iron plates.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) that smelts copper ore into copper plates.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) performing “automation” research (input: {automation-science-pack: 10}, status: NO_POWER).
- ElectricityGroup connecting small electric poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (10.5, 7.5), and (8.5, 6.5).

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(-10.5, 18.5)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at position(-10.5, 18.5) with warnings [“not connected to power network”, “no input liquid”, “no fluid present in connections”] and connection points at (-10.5, 16.0) and (-10.5, 21.0).
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) with status NO_FUEL and warning “out of fuel”; its fluid box holds water (amount ≈189.05, temperature 15) and is assigned fluid_system [62030].
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) with WORKING status linked to fluid_system [62030].
- Manual Fuel Feeding System represented by a wooden chest at position(-4.5, 25.5).
- Pipeline Network consisting of:
  - PipeGroup with fluid_system = 62030 at position(-5.5, 19.5) (status: WORKING)
  - PipeGroup with fluid_system = 62029 at position(-2.5, 19.5) (status: EMPTY)
  - PipeGroup with fluid_system = 62042 at position(5.5, 21.5) (status: EMPTY)
  - PipeGroup with fluid_system = 62041 at position(1.5, 23.5) (status: EMPTY)
  - PipeGroup with fluid_system = 62037 at position(-7.5, 25.5) (status: EMPTY)
  - PipeGroup with fluid_system = 62046 at position(0.5, 24.5) (status: EMPTY)
  - PipeGroup with fluid_system = 62045 at position(1.5, 25.5) (status: EMPTY)
  - PipeGroup with fluid_system = 62048 at position(1.5, 27.5) (status: EMPTY)
  - PipeGroup with fluid_system = 62049 at position(4.5, 27.5) (status: EMPTY)
  - PipeGroup with fluid_system = 62050 at position(-0.5, 28.5) (status: EMPTY)

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
• Pipeline Connection & Fluid Transfer:
  - Ensure both source and target connection points are unobstructed, within range, and share matching fluid system assignments.

• Entity Placement & Collision Avoidance:
  - Confirm that target tiles are unoccupied before placing entities.

• Buildable Area Calculation:
  - Use correct placement attributes to avoid type errors during position determination.

• Pipe Group Identification & Fluid System Mapping:
  - Verify that pipe groups with the required fluid_system are present near the intended connection points.
  - Review fluid system assignments if repeated candidate searches yield no valid pipe groups.

• Steam Engine Repositioning Failures:
  - Avoid repeated repositioning attempts using candidate pipe groups that are not present in the local network.
  - Verify that the fluid system identifiers (61366, 61450, 61532, 61616, 61698, 61782, 61864, 61948) match available pipe groups.
  - Consider expanding the search radius or reassessing candidate selection criteria when no matching pipe groups are detected.

• Boiler Fuel Supply Management:
  - Monitor and replenish boiler fuel promptly to maintain operational status.

• General Connection Strategies:
  - Review environmental constraints and inventory levels prior to executing repositioning or pipeline attachment actions.
